bind.jr:constraintMsg: Temperature must be between 32 and 44 degrees
Age must be less than 20 years / 240 months
'Other/None of the above' cannot be selected with other choices
Breating rate must be between 3 and 200 breaths per minute

bind.relevant: /imci/tmp/normalized/measles_risk and (/imci/fever/measles/mouth_ulcers = 'yes' or /imci/followup/measles_eye/pus_draining = 'yes') and not ((count-selected(/imci/preamble/danger_signs) > 0) or /imci/fever/measles/clouding_cornea = 'yes' or (/imci/fever/measles/mouth_ulcers = 'yes' and /imci/fever/measles/deep = 'yes' or /imci/followup/measles_eye/pus_draining = 'yes'))

/imci/tmp/normalized/measles_risk and not ((count-selected(/imci/preamble/danger_signs) > 0) or /imci/fever/measles/clouding_cornea = 'yes' or (/imci/fever/measles/mouth_ulcers = 'yes' and /imci/fever/measles/deep = 'yes' or /imci/followup/measles_eye/pus_draining = 'yes'))

/imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/cough = 'severe-pneumonia' or (/imci/tmp/normalized/classification/dehydration = 'severe' and /imci/other_severe='yes' ) or (/imci/tmp/normalized/classification/dehydration = 'some' and /imci/other_severe='yes') or /imci/tmp/normalized/classification/fever = 'febrile' or /imci/tmp/normalized/classification/measles = 'severe_complicated_measles'

/imci/tmp/normalized/has_severe or /imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/diarrhea = 'severe-persistent' or (selected(/imci/followup/followup_reasons,'persistent-diarrhea') and /imci/followup/diarrhea/loose_stools = 'three_or_more') or /imci/followup/dysentery/severe='yes' or /imci/followup/measles_mouth/foul_smell='yes' or /imci/followup/measles_eye/correctly_treating='yes' or /imci/dosing/pneumonia_antibiotic/use_second_line/second_line_available='no' or /imci/dosing/malaria_quinine/use_second_line/first_line_used = 'quinine' or /imci/dosing/dysentery_antibiotic/use_second_line/second_line_available = 'no'

/imci/visit_type = 'followup' and (/imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/cough = 'cold' or /imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/dehydration = 'none' or /imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/ear = 'none' or ((selected(/imci/followup/followup_reasons,'malaria') or selected(/imci/followup/followup_reasons,'fever_no_malaria')) and /imci/followup/better = 'yes') )

bind.calculate: if(/imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/fever = 'malaria', 3, if( /imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/cough = 'pneumonia' or (/imci/info/requires_urgent_referral != 'yes' and /imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/dehydration = 'severe') or (/imci/info/requires_urgent_referral != 'yes' and /imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/cough = 'severe-pneumonia') or (/imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/cough = 'cold' and /imci/cough/wheeze = 'yes') or /imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/dysentery = 'yes', 2, if((/imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/cough = 'cold' and /imci/visit_type = 'first') or /imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/dehydration = 'some' or (/imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/dehydration = 'none' and /imci/visit_type = 'first') or /imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/ear = 'acute' or /imci/tmp/normalized/diagnosis/ear = 'chronic', 5, '')))

Joto la mwili la mtoto.. TAZAMA: Joto la mwili la mtoto ni kiasi gani? (°C)

Pole sana! Matibabu ya magonjwa ya watoto unatumika kwa watoto wenye uzito wa kilogramu SAMAHANI: Pole sana! Matibabu ya magonjwa ya watoto unatumika kwa watoto wenye uzito wa kilogramu 19. Matibabu sahihi ya mtoto wako yanaweza yasiwepo. Je, ungependa kuendelea?
Pole sana! Matibabu ya magonjwa ya watoto yanatumika kwa watoto wenye umri.. SAMAHANI: Pole sana! Matibabu ya magonjwa ya watoto yanatumika kwa watoto wenye umri wa miaka mitano au pungufu. Je, ungependa kuendelea?
